resources.string: We first check if your email address is already registered with us.

Our social media platform is designed to make you feel safe and comfortable while scrolling through posts and chatting with your friends.\nWe value privacy and individuality and offer a unique experience based on your interests and preferences, without sharing your data with third parties.
This email address is not yet registered with us.\nLet\'s change it!

- At leat 8 characters
- At least on digit (0–9)
- At least one lowercase letter (a-z)
- At least one uppercase letter (A-Z)
- At least one special character from the following character classes:
!@#&()-[]{}:;',.?/*~$^+=

We have sent you a confirmation email.
Please confirm your email address to use this account.
If you do not see an email in your inbox, please check your spam folder.

If the email address you entered is incorrect, you can change it in the settings.
This email address has not been confirmed yet.
Password must be at least 8 characters long.
Your email address is already registered with us.\nTime to log in!
You have forgotten your password? No problem!\nJust enter your e-mail address and we will send you an e-mail with which you can re-enter your password.
We have sent you an email to reset your password.\nIf you don\'t see an email in your inbox, please check your spam folder.
In this step, you can select your interests, which will allow your home feed to be better personalized to you.
